text: midneun jadeul-iyeo! geudaedeul-i sadowa sajeog-in daehwaleul gajigoja hal ttaeneun geudaedeul-ui bimilseuleon daehwa ijeon-e huisageum-eul bepulla. igeos-i geudaedeul-ege deo joh-eun geos-imyeo deo kkaekkeushan geos-ila. man-yag geudaedeul-i (huisageum-eul) guhaji moshaessdamyeon sillo hananimkkeseoneun neogeuleoi yongseohasineun jaaelousin bun-ila
